data.title: A Heaven + Spawn Execute Dark Cover
data.description: Use this simple, but effective combination of utility to scale the A Site.

data.title: Default Top Mid Smoke + Door Lurk
data.description: This is a great smoke to default, as it isolates only one angle to contest from for Defenders. Use it to set up a potential lurk play towards the door.

data.title: Standard B Site Heaven and Spawn Dark Cover + Paranoia
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective way to enable your team when executing the B Site.
